    I am a PhD student at the Music Technology Group (MTG) of Universitat Pompeu Fabra (UPF) in Barcelona, Spain. I am dreaming of a complete machine listening system for enriching our music discovery. I love deep house music and football.

    Interests

    • Cross-modal Music Retrieval
    • Audio Representation Learning
    • Natural Language Processing
    • Self-supervised Learning
    • Music Recommendation / Discovery

    Education

    • (Present) PhD student at Universitat Pompeu Fabra
    • MSc in Sound and Music Computing at Universitat Pompeu Fabra
    • MSc in Digital Contents and Information Studies at Seoul National University
    • BSc in Electronic Engineering at Sogang University
